title: Why not pink hairlining for new Jinx skin?
body:
I thought it would look better if jinx had a pink or blue hair lining.
I know how the jade would look good with the little gems she has in her clothing.
But this is my opinion.
What are your thoughts guys?{{champion:222}}

replies.body: We chose green since it tied in with the color scheme of the skin. ^-^
She doesn't want to be mistaken for Fiora.
I think the blue is just to revert to her natural hair color
cause it is not with the theme of the skin.
The green looks a lot better than the mock-ups you did.

I'll be honest,the pink & blue (especially the blue) looks out of place.
Plus,the splash released onto the pbe isn't even the finished product.
